name: TREPIDATION (VIBEGAMES)
description:
Dive into a game centered around terror and the unknown.

Complete a mini game to receive a new part of the house. Complete all of them to 

unlock all the doors.   

Devs note-

I'm solo developer that tries his best to create original horror game content. I'm the kinda guy that never gets scared during the scary movies and rarely jumps from jumpscares. So what I've done in this game is created a game that does scare me personally, using terror, sounds, and a build up. It wasn't exactly what I wanted, but its still scary enough. 

If you enjoyed this game please donate to help me out and to encourage me to work more on horror games.
